newsitem.title: JAPAN: Toshiba mulls Y100 bln straight bond issue - sources.
newsitem.headline: Toshiba mulls Y100 bln straight bond issue - sources.

text.p: Toshiba Corp is considering issuing 100 billion yen worth of domestic straight bonds, underwriting sources said on Thursday.
A Toshiba official confirmed that the company was considering issuing domestic straight bonds but could not comment on the amount or other details.
"We are considering issuing domestic straight bonds. But we have not yet decided on specifics, including whether or not we will actually issue them," the Toshiba official said.
The sources said Toshiba was likely to issue straight bonds in four tranches. They said the company may decide terms of the bonds and start sales as early as Friday if market conditions allowed.
They added, however, that because of recent jitters in the bond market, they could not say for sure whether Toshiba would decide the terms on Friday.
